overview: This analysis provides a comprehensive overview of a hybrid cloud solution utilizing Azure Local, integrating on-premises resources with Azure services. The architecture includes traditional applications, Kubernetes-based applications, and various management tools, interconnected through a robust network infrastructure with a focus on security and compliance.

components.name: Control Plane
components.description: Manages resources via Azure Portal, Azure CLI, Azure Policy, and Azure Key Vault.
security_considerations: Use of role-based access control (RBAC) for resource management.
components.data_handling: Manages sensitive configuration data and secrets.
components.encryption_status: Data at rest is encrypted using Azure encryption standards.

components.name: Azure Local Instance
components.description: Hosts traditional and non-containerized applications, Arc VMs, and Hyper-V.
security_considerations: Regular patching and updates for the Hyper-V environment.
Isolation of VMs using network security groups.
components.data_handling: Handles both sensitive and non-sensitive data.
components.encryption_status: Data at rest is encrypted; data in transit is secured using VPN.

components.name: Kubernetes-based Applications
components.description: Managed through Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) enabled by Azure Arc.
security_considerations: Use of network policies to control traffic between pods.
Regular vulnerability scanning of container images.
components.encryption_status: Data in transit is encrypted; secrets are managed via Azure Key Vault.

components.name: Corp Firewall
components.description: Provides security for outbound access to required URL endpoints.
security_considerations: Regular updates to firewall rules based on threat intelligence.
Logging and monitoring of outbound traffic.
components.data_handling: Controls all outbound traffic from the local environment.
vulnerabilities: Misconfigured rules leading to unauthorized access

security_risks: Exposure of secrets if not properly managed

trust_boundaries.name: On-Premises to Azure Boundary
recommendations: Implement stricter firewall rules based on least privilege.
Enhance monitoring and alerting for outbound traffic.

trust_boundaries.name: Kubernetes Cluster Boundary
recommendations: Conduct regular security assessments of container images.
Implement automated scanning for vulnerabilities in CI/CD pipelines.
